data.title: Souraa Song Lyrics – Bharateeyudu 2 (2024)
data.meta_description: You will find souraa song lyrics in English and telugu. "Paaraa" Song Details:Movie Title: Indian 2 (also marketed as Indian 2: Zero...
data.text:
In this blog you will find Souraa song lyrics in English and telugu. The song “Souraa” from the highly anticipated Telugu movie “Bharateeyudu 2” of 2024 has created quite a buzz. Released on May 22, 2024, the track is a part of the movie’s soundtrack, which has been composed by the talented Anirudh Ravichander. The song features the vocal talents of Anirudh himself, along with Ritesh G Rao and Shruthika Samudhrala. The lyrics, penned by Suddala Ashok Teja, add depth and emotion to the composition, resonating with the audience.

“Bharateeyudu 2” stars Kamal Haasan in the lead role, and the film’s cast includes notable names like Siddharth, Kajal Agarwal, and Rakul Preet Singh. The song “Souraa” has been provided to YouTube by Sony Music Entertainment India Pvt. Ltd., and it has garnered significant attention and views shortly after its release. The movie itself is a sequel to the original “Bharateeyudu” and is directed by Shankar, promising to be a blockbuster with its star-studded cast and gripping storyline.

Souraa Song Lyrics More Info
